name: Our Lady's Lady
description:
A Short horror game about a high school student who decides to skip their detention.

 Little did they know, doing that would be the biggest mistake of their life.

Late at night, they get transported back to the school and is greeted by Our Lady's Lady.

The ghost that haunts the hallways. 

Your goal is to collect the 5 keys that are scattered around the school and escape but be careful of the ghoul as she could come out of any classroom at any time. 

THINGS TO KNOW

1 - The script that allows you to collect the keys did not work so they are just scattered around the map just sat there. So what that means is there is no way of finishing the game so once you find the keys give yourself a pat on the back and then esc out. 

2 - There is no enemy AI as i wasn't able to add it into the game in time.

3 - There is also no sound.
